item.title: Rails API Integration Tests
item.description: A web-services-oriented architecture encourages the development of multiple, modular applications over maintaining a single large, all-in-one monolithic piece of software. Often, the web services paradigm involves the development of clients apps that rely upon third party RESTful web services. Labor and responsibilities are divided and conquered across smaller, more manageable codebases and teams. But how can such a client application verify graceful integration? With a large user-base, such insight is increasingly critical.
